about.title: Nexdor Solution
about.description: Nexdor is a trusted bridge between traditional retailers and brands, distributors, and wholesalers. We are committed to providing comprehensive distribution solutions, driving the robust growth of traditional businesses within the modern retail ecosystem.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide comprehensive solutions to help your business thrive in the digital era
services.brandConsultingDescription: Hand-crafted solution for unique, complex brand situation.

aboutUs.title: Our Story
aboutUs.description: Nexdor Solution takes pride in our experienced team and deep market understanding, delivering creative, personalized strategies to help clients optimize business performance and build strong brands. At Nexdor Solution, we are not just partners but trusted companions, committed to helping you achieve every goal and create lasting value. Let us help you tell your brand story in an impressive and successful way!

coreValues.title: Market research & Localization
coreValues.description: We offer deep, comprehensive insights into the Vietnamese market, equipping you with the knowledge to make informed strategic decisions and unlock success. With our expertise, you can confidently navigate the market and seize growth opportunities.

vision.title: D2C Solution
vision.description: Nexdor equips you with a cutting-edge D2C technology platform, enabling you to seamlessly build and manage your direct-to-consumer sales channels.

mission.title: Branding & Marketing Solution
mission.description: Nexdor Solution will be your trusted partner throughout every stage of your marketing journey, from strategic planning to flawless campaign execution, ensuring your brand stands out and resonates deeply with Vietnamese consumers.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: With an expansive distribution network and strategic partnerships across 53 provinces, We ensures your products reach every corner of the Vietnamese market from bustling cities to the most remote rural areas.
